name: SMACrossOver
description: This strategy uses a simple moving average crossover to determine when to buy and sell assets. It uses two moving averages, a short window and a long window. When the short window crosses above the long window, it generates a buy signal. When the short window crosses below the long window, it generates a sell signal.

name: RSI
description: This strategy uses the Relative Strength Index (RSI) to determine when to buy and sell assets. The RSI is a momentum oscillator that measures the speed and change of price movements. It ranges from 0 to 100 and is typically used to identify overbought and oversold conditions in the market. When the RSI is above the overbought threshold, it generates a sell signal. When the RSI is below the oversold threshold, it generates a buy signal.

name: BollingerBands
description: This strategy uses Bollinger Bands to determine when to buy and sell assets. Bollinger Bands are a volatility indicator that consists of a simple moving average and two standard deviations above and below the moving average. When the price moves above the upper band, it generates a sell signal. When the price moves below the lower band, it generates a buy signal.

name: MACD
description: This strategy uses the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) to determine when to buy and sell assets. The MACD is a trend-following momentum indicator that shows the relationship between two moving averages of an asset's price. When the MACD line crosses above the signal line, it generates a buy signal. When the MACD line crosses below the signal line, it generates a sell signal.

name: StochasticOscillator
description: This strategy uses the Stochastic Oscillator to determine when to buy and sell assets. The Stochastic Oscillator is a momentum indicator that compares an asset's closing price to its price range over a specific period of time. When the Stochastic Oscillator is above the overbought threshold, it generates a sell signal. When the Stochastic Oscillator is below the oversold threshold, it generates a buy signal.
